sn35.77:1.1: “Yam kho, radha, dukkham tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.77:1.3: Cakkhu kho, radha, dukkham. Tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.77:1.7: yampidam cakkhusamphassa …pe… adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham. Tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.77:1.12: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham. Tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.77:1.13: Yam kho, radha, dukkham tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
